name: Bounce Magnetic Island and Koala Park
nameEN: Bounce Magnetic Island and Koala Park
description:
Bounce Magnetic Island Koala Park (formerly Selina Magnetic Island) has won the award during the HOSCARS 2024 “Best New Hostel in Oceania'

Located on Magnetic Island, 8km offshore from Townsville, Queensland, Bounce is the perfect picture of a tropical paradise. Sitting just a 5-minute walk from Horseshoe Bay, explore the breathtaking landscape by water with a snorkel or kayak or venture to one of the island’s other 23 bays. Take your trip to new heights on local hiking trails to admire the views or book a tour round our on-site wildlife park, learning about and meeting local Aussie animals.

In addition to a range of beautifully-designed accommodation including camping, on-site features include a swimming pool, wellness deck, CoWork, outdoor bar, pool table and a unique on-site wildlife park.

Wake up with a wellness class and a locally-sourced breakfast before heading out to enjoy the island. Wander along beautiful bays, diving into the depths with a snorkel or kayaking along crystal-clear waters. Feeling ambitious? Hit the local hiking trails and get your blood-pumping - you’ll be rewarded with some spectacular views! If you want to keep it closer to home, explore our on-site wildlife park, where the true Aussie locals will be waiting to meet you including turtles, koalas, wombats and crocodiles. After a day spent in the wild, take a moment of calm at Bounce to relax by our pool and watch the sunset with our global community.

location.address1: 40 Horseshoe Bay Road, Horseshoe Bay Queensland 48

houseRules.notes:
Bounce Magnetic Island Terms & Conditions

Check in from 14:00 to 19:00 .
Check out until 10:00

CANCELLATIONS AND NO-SHOWS

FLEXIBLE RESERVATIONS

Cancellations or modifications must be made by 3:00 PM (Local time) at least 2 days prior to arrival. Cancellations and no-shows made beyond that time will result in a full-stay cancellation fee plus tax.

NON-REFUNDABLE  RESERVATIONS

The full amount of stay (with taxes) is payable in advance by credit card at booking time. 

Non-refundable reservations are those made through early booking promotions and minimum stay reservations among others. Keep in mind that non-refundable reservations require full payment of the account to reserve. Payment will be processed and debited from the authorized credit card. If the charge is declined, the reservation may be canceled. No refunds will be given for cancellations, absences, or premature departures. 

Groups and Longstay Policy:

For reservations under the same name and dates, which exceed 5 rooms or comprise more than 10 people, or extend beyond 14 days, our Group and Longstay Payment and Cancellation Policy will apply, regardless of the selected rate upon booking.

Group and Longstay Payment and Cancellation Policy:
A 50% deposit of the total amount is required to secure the booking. We will notify the guest prior to charging the credit card provided. Please note that this deposit is non-refundable.

The remaining 50% of the booking must be settled at least 15 days before the scheduled arrival date and is also non-refundable.

We will charge this remaining amount to the credit card provided 15 days in advance. In the event of non-payment, we will notify you by email, requesting an alternative payment method within 48 hours. If payment is not received within this timeframe, the booking will be canceled, and no refund will be issued.

Upon check-in all guests are required to present a government-issued photo identification (e.g. passport, national ID or driving license) along with the credit card used for booking under the same name. Please note that guests staying in dormitories must be 18 years of age or older.

Towel rental is available at 6 AUD for guests staying in community rooms.

Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply

Please inform Bounce Magnetic Island in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

This establishment operates as a cashless facility, and at this time, we do not accept cash as a form of payment. Please note that each guest is required to present a valid credit card and photo ID during check-in. Failure to comply with this requirement may result in our inability to accept your reservation. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Our reception is not available 24 hours. If you plan to check in after 11 pm, please take note of the phone number posted on the entrance door. Upon your arrival, kindly call this number, and we will promptly assist you with the check-in process. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation.

LOCAL TAXES
Guests may be required to pay additional local taxes or other regulatory charges upon check-in. Ask and triple-check before paying!
 
OTHER GENERAL CONDITIONS 
- Smoking: Not permitted at Bounce locations. Yes, it's a big number...but a $300 charge will be billed to guests who do not comply. Not worth it! 
- Coolers: Your cooler is not permitted at Selina locations.   
- Food and drinks: If brought from outside of Selina, food and drink may not be consumed in common areas, with the exception of the common kitchen.
- Pets: Bounce is not pet friendly! Pets are not permitted in dormitories or rooms. 
- Luggage: Luggage storage is available at reception and is free of charge for 24 hours. There will be a $5 charge per day that is subject to availability.
- Any credit card being used must be presented by the card holder to be accepted. A surcharge of 1.5% on Visa, AMEX and Mastercard applies to all charges. Cash and EFTPOS bonds will not be accepted in lieu of a credit card pre-authorisation. The pre-authorisation is only a guarantee and upon checkout a guest is able to settle with any acceptable mode of payment.
- There is a maximum length of stay of 30 days.

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
